Articles.Content:
I obliterate the planet with an antimater bomb, and then find Venus, which i colonize.

My precious, precious Venus.

I take rss away, causeing you to fall, and poof on eve.

I then claim a phantom hill on jol my hill(btw, I think that one can land on jool, just carefully and with a re-texture(meaning make the surface visible.)

I survive the fall \*since i'm a tough venera probe\* and then i blow up jool.

My landing site on Eve.

I then find a bug that is rooted so deep into the game, they have to revert to where there was only kerbin.

I then claim their antenna and add a force feild mod.

my forcefeild protected hill.

I hack ksp install the missingno mod I'm working on then capture the hill

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-13T22:55:50Z" title="03/13/2015 10:55  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 13, 2015</time> by Ethanadams**

exept you fail to realize it works off of some 0.90 code, but ksp is in 0.14.5 mode.

still my hill.

But you fail to realize that I have made to work in all game formats

my computer digital hill

I delete the internet, and go outside and find a hill, which i have fun playing on top of.

My playing hill.
I jOin you are hill

war comes to your country, killing all the women, children, and unable to work men.

I then have america threaten the country with nukes(because I teach nasa how to ssto) an they are now my utopian hill. but I keep you alive as slaves.

I summon Shrek.

My massive crowd of grown men running away from an ogre.

I'll animate ogre killer with cool x-ray specs, laser gun and electric sword that kills your ogre. People come back and hail him as their lord. Since I am the one animating him, it's my laws there now.

My anime hill.

I then ban all anime, and my starship created in the utopia comes and sends in all it's fighters, killing your ogre killer and saving my people.

my utopian hill. do not hurt my people, or you are going to get a plasma beam that is 110% the size of the cellestial body you are on. no mater what planet, sun, black hole, galaxy, etc. you are on.
I use the master sword the triforce and the kraken with a helix fossil to make a perfect utopia that if you ate ack it you become a normal citizen

I fly over from the KSSR with a Tupolev Tu-95 and drop a 100 megaton nuclear bomb on your utopia, therefore completely vaporizing any trace of its existence.

My irradiated and destroyed utopia.

But as I said before the triforce repeals you and you become a citizen still my utopia 

(the is a loop hole

I go to Tekto.

My hill on Tekto.

I launch an ICBM with 6 nuclear MIRVs. Two of the MIRVs are dummies, and the rest are able to evade detection through advanced technologies so that the Triforce only repels the dummies but not the real ones. A few minutes later, the MIRVs detonate one by one over your utopia, each having a yield of 14.3 megatons. This completely destroys your utopia and kills everyone in it. What's left is a desolate landscape of destruction. Everywhere you look, there's simply rubble of old establishments, with skeletons left from people being instantly vaporized by the bombs.

My destroyed utopia and KSSR.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-15T20:01:01Z" title="03/15/2015 08:01  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 15, 2015</time> by mythbusters844**

An army of spooky scary skeletons pops out! And kills EVERYONE.

My desolation, inhabited solely by skeletons.

the argos' AI(wich is a copy of my brain) commands the ares(in the same fleet) to destroy the galaxy. it does, and Jake(the A.I.'s name) revives me so I can claim duna as my hill. before I destroy the galaxy, I take souper and make him my slave that has no more sentience, and force his mind to watch his family die, over and over until he regrets. meanwhile, cloning takes place to populate my countless forcefully taken hills.

my hills.

don't kill my people. you will watch everything you love die. one. by. one. over and over again.

(in the foru game of course)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-16T00:10:21Z" title="03/16/2015 12:10  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 16, 2015</time> by jake9039**

I somehow super duper ultra magically take over everything and do [this](http://lparchive.org/I-Have-No-Mouth-and-I-Must-Scream/Update%2071/images/s_033.png) to jake9039 and then i become the super awesome awesome g0d of everything and become ultra mega awesome and build a Dystopian communist USSR of all the multiverses and also become invincible and indestructible and immortal and omniscient and Omnipotent and omnipresent.

My glory.

TORMENT JAKE9039. TORMENT JAKE9039. TORMENT JAKE9039.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-16T00:23:03Z" title="03/16/2015 12:23  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 16, 2015</time> by Souper**

exept I die from cianide and jake(the AI one) calls sheild, wich destroys you(because hulk and thor)

he then revives me.

no killing my people.

I automagically come back to existence, and then proceed to take your people into custody. They are tortured brutally and mercillessly forever, but we make sure they don't die. (Loophole exploited.) The same thing happens to you, as i find a hill.

My.

Hill.

exept one gets sick, and with(quote from my science teacher)"rapid cell **death**" jake takes the ares and it attacks with all its power.

please note, the power is consentrated on your brain.

there is enough power to destroy everything in the universe. with the ability to destroy about 5 billion more galaxies if they existed.

then, I lock you up in the dark universe. strapped to an antimater bomb.

then, you get tortured so much, you regret going against me, begging me for forgiveness.

I get my utopia back.

I then keep the utopia safe with the ares doing the same thing to anybody that hurts my people.

I give up on trying to fight jake and form an alliance on his main hill.

OUR allied hill!
